name: L2 Think Tank
tag_list: think-tank, l2, l2-think-tank, marketing-innovation, digital-innovation, luxury, prestige, fashion, financial-services, travel, pharma, china, digital-marketing
overview:
Overview L2 is a think tank for digital innovation. We are a membership organization that brings together thought leadership from academia and industry to drive digital marketing innovation. Drawing from original research, best practices, and emerging trends, L2 distills this intellectual capital and makes it actionable for our partners.

Research L2 Digital IQ IndexÂ® reports provide brands with a benchmark to measure digital competence against peers. Developed by L2 founder and NYU Stern Professor Scott Galloway, the Digital IQ is a robust tool that scores brands on over 100 quantitative and qualitative data points, diagnosing their digital strengths and weaknesses. Learn more about L2 Research

Events Forums: Big-picture thinking and game-changing innovations meet education and entertainment. The largest gatherings of prestige executives in North America. (300+ attendees) Clinics: Executive education in a classroom setting with a balance of theory, tactics, and case studies. (80-150 attendees) Working Lunches: Members-only lunches led by digital thought leaders and academics. Topic immersion in a relaxed environment that encourages open discussion. (12-24 attendees) MBA Mashups: Access and introduction to digital marketing talent from top MBA schools.. Learn more about L2 Events

Consulting Advisory Services: L2 works with brands on 4-8 week engagements to help garner greater return on investment in digital initiatives. Advisory work includes Brand Digital Roadmaps, Social Media Strategy, and Site Optimization projects.
